title: Authors and Citation
text: Saldanha R (2023). opendenguedata: Download data opendengue project. R package version 0.0.0.9000, https://rfsaldanha.github.io/opendenguedata/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {opendenguedata: Download data from opendengue project},   author = {Raphael Saldanha},   year = {2023},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9000},   url = {https://rfsaldanha.github.io/opendenguedata/}, }

title: Download file from url — download_file
code: download_file(   file_url = parent.frame()$file_url,   showProgress = parent.frame()$showProgress,   cache = parent.frame()$cache )

title: Download file from url — download_file
text: file_url String. url. showProgress Logical. cache Logical.

title: Pipe operator — %>%
text: lhs value magrittr placeholder. rhs function call using magrittr semantics.

what: Read data from OpenDengue github repository — read_data
title: Read data from OpenDengue github repository — read_data
Read data from OpenDengue github repository — read_data
code: read_data(   extract,   columns = NULL,   as_data_frame = FALSE,   showProgress = TRUE,   cache = TRUE )

title: Read data from OpenDengue github repository — read_data
text: extract character. national, spatial temporal columns character vector. Columns names subset. as_data_frame logical. TRUE returns data.frame object. FALSE returns Arrow Table object. Defaults FALSE. showProgress logical. Show download bar progress console. cache logical. Use cached data first download.
